amuse.interfaces.nodes
Interface NodeEventSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassifierNodeScheduler, ExtractorNodeScheduler, NodeScheduler, OptimizerNodeScheduler, ProcessorNodeScheduler, TrainerNodeScheduler, ValidatorNodeScheduler
public interface NodeEventSource

The instances which generate NodeEvents should implement this interface
